job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen en implementeren van AI-oplossingen gebaseerd op large language models (LLM's).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the design and implementation of AI solutions using LLMs, which falls under the core definition of 'Modeling' in the context of generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyseren en voorbereiden van datasets voor optimale modelprestaties.
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing and preparing datasets is a crucial part of the data engineering process to ensure models perform optimally.

job_tasks.phrase: Verbeteren van de kwaliteit en nauwkeurigheid van tekstmodellen.
job_tasks.justification: Improving the quality and accuracy of text models directly relates to the training, fine-tuning, and optimization of AI models, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Testen, valideren en continu optimaliseren van ontwikkelde oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: Testing, validating, and continuously optimizing developed solutions are key activities in operations and maintenance of AI systems, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Zorgen voor een veilige en verantwoorde toepassing van AI-technologieën.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring secure and responsible application of AI technologies implies building robust and safe user-facing systems, which is part of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Zorgen voor een veilige en verantwoorde toepassing van AI-technologieën.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the design, implementation, and improvement of solutions using large language models (LLMs), which is a core responsibility of a GenAI Engineer. The focus on applying AI models to enhance specific applications and ensuring responsible usage further aligns with the profile's definition.
